price: 6. (Nabiyow) dheh: “Waxaa (Qur’aankan) soo dejiyey (Allaah ee ah) Kan ogsoon sirta samooyinka iyo arlada. Hubaal, Alle waa Denbi Dhaaf Badane, Naxariis Badan.
arabic: قُلۡ أَنزَلَهُ ٱلَّذِي يَعۡلَمُ ٱلسِّرَّ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qul anzalahu alladhī yaʿlamu al-sira fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi innahu kāna ghafūran raḥīman
